text: I can confirm that it happens often for me as well, both on windows and ubuntu. After some time, sometimes several minutes, all the "run code" happens at once.

elements.text: I can confirm that it happens often for me as well, both on windows and ubuntu. After some time, sometimes several minutes, all the "run code" happens at once.

text: I had this issue a month or two back. I am not sure if they are correlated, but I would run `top` and see a whole bunch of `julia` processes. Probably from REPLs that I crashed/ctrl-c'd? Either way, closing VSCode and killing all of the remaining `julia` processes seemed to help!
